subproject.corporate outcome: Livelihoods and economic recovery generated, including infrastructure restoration, employment and sustainable income earning opportunities for crisis affected communities
subproject.description:
TRWMP Phase I
1. Continued support for MSW collection/ Extension of TWRFs in KBA, Aceh Barat & Implementation of TWRFs in other impacted Districts
2. Rehabilitation of Gampong Jawa Dumpsite in KBA and potentially other dumpsites in Aceh
3. Restoration and/or creation of livelihoods in waste management and/or utilizing recovery/ recycled materials
4. Effective and efficient management, monitoring and oversight of the overall programme on behalf of the MDTFANS donor partners

TRWMP Phase II

1.	District government sanitation departments’ financial and technical capacity for sustainable waste management systems increased 
2.	Detailed design and construction of permanent district landfills prepared, including the regional sanitary landfill in KBA/Aceh Besar
3.	Sustainable private sector waste management livelihoods to increase the economic benefits of recycling and decrease the volume of waste in Aceh created
4.	Project is effectively and efficiently managed, monitored, evaluated, and audited.
subproject.title: Tsunami Waste Management Proj.
